Action.TextAuraExpression: REMINDER: #8 - Brute Justice (Cardinal Side) - Second Void - Look Middle
REMINDER: #1 - Cruise Chaser - Third Void - Look Outside
REMINDER: #2 - Opp. Cruise Chaser - Third Void - Look Middle
REMINDER: #4 - Opp. Brute Justice - Look Middle
REMINDER: #5 - Cruise Chaser (Void Side) - First Void - Look Outside
REMINDER: #6 - Brute Justice (Void Side) - First Void - Look Middle
REMINDER: #7 - Cruise Chaser (Cardinal Side) - Second Void - Look Outside

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: One, Cruise Chaser, third void, look outside
Two, Opposite Cruise Chaser, third void, look middle
Four, Opposite Brute Justice, look middle
Five, Cruise Chaser side void, first void, look outside
Six, Brute Justice side void, first void. look middle
Seven, Cruise Chaser side cardinal. Dodge chakrams. Second void, look outside
Eight, Brute Justice side Cardinal, dodge chakrams, second void, look middle
